title: Print, "Band of Clouds (Kumo no Obi), No. 4", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Band of Clouds
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 4 / Kumo no Obi.
description: A large purple iris, the outer perianth leaves having light blue markings above and beneath. Inner leaves white and purple beneath. Upper portion leaves, stem, bud, against neutral background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Band of Clouds (Kumo no Obi), No. 4", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.2 x 27.9 cm (15 13/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-59.
